fragility.properties: Provides robust external protection against crushing forces

fragility.properties: Improved cushioning compared to standard molded pulp, sustainable

shelf_life.properties: Good gas barrier, minimizes moisture loss, extends shelf life slightly
shelf_life.application: Clear egg cartons designed to maintain freshness

shelf_life.properties: Moisture resistant, prevents mold growth, good for refrigerated storage
shelf_life.application: Reusable containers that maintain a clean environment

shelf_life.properties: Controls gas composition inside the package (e.g., CO2, N2) to inhibit microbial growth
shelf_life.application: Extending shelf life in bulk packaging for commercial use (requires specialized equipment)

shelf_life.properties: Removes ethylene gas produced by eggs, slowing down spoilage
shelf_life.application: Integrated into packaging to extend freshness (less common for eggs)

shelf_life.properties: Inhibits bacterial growth on the packaging surface, reducing contamination risk
shelf_life.application: Applied to carton surfaces to maintain hygiene and prolong shelf life

shelf_life.properties: Film tightly adheres to the eggs, minimizing air exposure and preventing movement

shelf_life.properties: Provides a moisture barrier, preventing the cardboard from becoming soggy and weakening
shelf_life.application: Maintains structural integrity of cartons in humid environments

shelf_life.properties: Absorbs moisture within the packaging to maintain a dry environment and prevent microbial growth
shelf_life.application: Used in specific applications where humidity control is critical

shelf_life.properties: Removes oxygen to prevent spoilage caused by oxidation, extending the egg's freshness.
shelf_life.application: Used in specific applications to maintain freshness (less common for eggs)

shelf_life.properties: Reduces light exposure which can degrade egg quality over time.
shelf_life.application: Outer packaging intended for prolonged retail display.

chemical_properties.properties: Adhesives that do not release formaldehyde, ensuring food safety.

chemical_properties.properties: Plastics that do not contain Bisphenol A (BPA), reducing the risk of chemical leaching.

chemical_properties.properties: Ensures compliance with European Union regulations for plastic materials and articles intended to come into contact with food.
